original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role offers a unique opportunity to blend your business acumen with technical proficiency, serving as a crucial link between complex business processes and effective system configurations. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate with maximum efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing new processes and implementing technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive rapid innovation.

In this role, you will collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using a variety of techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows. You will then translate these business requirements into technical configurations within our robust [mention specific system] backend. This will involve developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving any configuration-related issues that may arise.

To excel in this position, you will need to possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities. Your ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences will be crucial. Additionally, you should have a solid understanding of Java and SQL, as these skills will be highly valued in this role.

While prior experience with machine learning and implementation is required, we also welcome candidates with experience in Agile methodologies and vehicle configuration, as these skills would be considered a significant advantage. Ultimately, your passion for driving innovation, your commitment to continuous improvement, and your ability to work seamlessly with cross-functional teams will be the keys to your success in this dynamic and rewarding role.

As a Configuration Specialist in our organization, you will have the unique opportunity to leverage your exceptional business acumen and technical proficiency to drive transformative changes within our vehicle configuration systems. Your role will be pivotal in ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of our business and operate at peak efficiency.

In this position, you will collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments, delving deep into their business requirements and translating them into highly effective technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This will involve developing and maintaining detailed configuration specifications, creating and modifying complex data mappings and integrations, implementing and thoroughly testing new configurations, and swiftly resolving any configuration-related issues that may arise.

To excel in this role, you will need to possess a keen analytical mindset, exceptional problem-solving skills, and the ability to communicate complex technical information in a clear and concise manner that resonates with both technical and non-technical audiences. Your strong interpersonal and collaboration abilities will be instrumental in building strong relationships with stakeholders and ensuring seamless cross-functional coordination.

While proficiency in Java and SQL is a must-have, we also highly value candidates with prior experience in machine learning (ML) and implementation. Your ability to leverage the power of ML and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive rapid innovation and streamline business processes will be a significant asset in this role.

Additionally, we welcome applicants with experience in Agile methodologies and a deep understanding of vehicle configuration, as these skills would provide a distinct advantage in this dynamic and ever-evolving position. Your passion for continuous improvement, your commitment to excellence, and your ability to thrive in a collaborative environment will be the keys to your success in this transformative role.

Embark on an exciting journey as a Configuration Specialist, where you'll have the opportunity to blend your exceptional business acumen with cutting-edge technical expertise. In this pivotal role, you'll be at the forefront of driving transformative changes within our vehicle configuration systems, ensuring they accurately reflect the evolving needs of our business and operate with unparalleled efficiency.

As the Configuration Specialist, you'll collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments, delving deep into their business requirements and translating them into highly effective technical configurations within our robust [mention specific system] backend. This will involve developing and maintaining comprehensive configuration specifications, creating and modifying intricate data mappings and integrations, implementing and rigorously testing new configurations, and swiftly resolving any configuration-related issues that may arise.

To excel in this role, you'll need to possess a keen analytical mindset, exceptional problem-solving skills, and the ability to communicate complex technical information in a clear and compelling manner that resonates with both technical and non-technical audiences. Your strong interpersonal and collaboration abilities will be instrumental in building strong relationships with stakeholders and ensuring seamless cross-functional coordination.

While proficiency in Java and SQL is a must-have, we also highly value candidates with prior experience in machine learning (ML) and implementation. Your ability to leverage the power of ML and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive rapid innovation and streamline business processes will be a significant asset in this role.

Additionally, we welcome applicants with experience in Agile methodologies and a deep understanding of vehicle configuration, as these skills would provide a distinct advantage in this dynamic and ever-evolving position. Your passion for continuous improvement, your commitment to excellence, and your ability to thrive in a collaborative environment will be the keys to your success in this transformative role.
